subject: Skiing
Drones (Pilotless Planes)
Alpine Skiing
World Cup (Skiing)
lead_paragraph: A camera drone crashed near Marcel Hirscher during a race in Madonna di Campiglio, Italy, that Henrik Kristoffersen of Norway won by a 1.25-second margin.
snippet: A camera drone crashed near Marcel Hirscher during a race in Madonna di Campiglio, Italy, that Henrik Kristoffersen of Norway won by a 1.25-second margin.
